Snippy-tldr
===========

Snippy_ plugin to import tldr_ man pages.

Installation
============

To install, run:

.. code:: text

    pip install snippy-tldr --user

.. _Snippy: https://github.com/heilaaks/snippy

.. _tldr: https://github.com/tldr-pages/tldr
